definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: Again determined to rule out a reaction to textures, the neurologists tested her with colored light.
sentences.chinese: 再次決心排除反應紋理，神經學家測試與彩色光她。

sentences.english: The neurology of all this is a bit more complicated, but that’s the basic idea.
sentences.chinese: 這一切從神經學上看有點複雜，但這就是基本的想法。

sentences.english: Haynes wasn't the first neuroscientist to explore unconscious decision-making.
sentences.chinese: 海恩斯並非第一個探究無意識思考決策的神經學家。

sentences.english: No question, neuromarketing has its doubters.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，有人對神經學營銷是持懷疑態度的。

sentences.english: Well the so called MS experts are neurologists.
sentences.chinese: 神經學家是這樣巧舌如簧的。

sentences.english: At the moment, the neuroscience of trust remains extremely provisional.
sentences.chinese: 當前，有關信任的神經學依然處在臨時行爲狀態。

sentences.english: There is a final new chapter on forensic neurology.
sentences.chinese: 在法庭的神經學上有一最後的新章。

sentences.english: George Bartzokis, a professor of neurology at U. C.
sentences.chinese: 神經學教授喬治告訴我。

sentences.english: I had spent the last few months boning up on neurology.
sentences.chinese: 我用最後幾個月的時間複習了神經學課程。

sentences.english: At the same time I have the MRI and neurological quite interested.
sentences.chinese: 同時我也對神經學與MRI頗感興趣。

sentences.english: On the one hand, Freud made his start as a neuroscientist.
sentences.chinese: 一方面，弗洛伊德在一開始時是一位神經學家。

sentences.english: Proprioception is a kind of neurological test.
sentences.chinese: 本體感受性試驗是一種神經學檢查。

sentences.english: Asia Pacific Neurology Devices Investment Opportunities, Analysi…
sentences.chinese: 亞太神經學儀器投資機會分析預測報告。

sentences.english: But I haven’t started neurology yet.
sentences.chinese: 但我還沒有開始學神經學。

sentences.english: Sacks, Oliver - official site of the neurologist-writer. Contact information, news, and links.
sentences.chinese: 供神經學家參考的官方站點，有關信息，新聞及鏈接。

sentences.english: The acute metabolic decompensation and neurological deterioration attribute to severe sequelae.
sentences.chinese: 急性代謝異常和神經學的病變往往造成嚴重的後遺症。
